Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of short arginine- and tryptophan-rich peptides.
Literature.Author: Strøm MB, Rekdal O, Svendsen JS

Literature.Title: A Head-to-Head Comparison of the Antimicrobial Activities of 30 Ultra-Short Antimicrobial Peptides Against Staphylococcus aureus, Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Candida albicans
Literature.Author: Lau QY, Choo XY, Lim ZX, Kong XN, Ng FM, Ang M, Hill J, Chia CS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 100(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=12.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=100µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=>100µM)
